{{cpp/chrono/year_month_day_last/title|year|month|day|month_day_last}}
{{cpp/chrono/year_month_day_last/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=1|
constexpr std::chrono::year year() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=2|
constexpr std::chrono::month month() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=3|
constexpr std::chrono::day day() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=4|
constexpr std::chrono::month_day_last month_day_last() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Retrieves the field values stored in this {{tt|year_month_day_last}} object.

===Return value===
@1@ Returns the stored {{lc|std::chrono::year}} value.
@2@ Returns the stored {{lc|std::chrono::month}} value.
@3@ A {{lc|std::chrono::day}} value corresponding to the last day of the stored year and month. If {{c|this-&gt;ok()}} is {{c|false}}, the return value is unspecified.
@4@ A {{lc|std::chrono::month_day_last}} constructed from {{tt|month()}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;

int main()
{
    constexpr auto ymdl{std::chrono::last/11/2020};
    static_assert
    (
        ymdl.day() == std::chrono::day(30) &amp;&amp;
        ymdl.month() == std::chrono::November &amp;&amp;
        ymdl.year() == std::chrono::year(2020) &amp;&amp;
        ymdl.month_day_last() == std::chrono::November/std::chrono::last
    );
}
}}
